0.47.name: wordpress/showikrss
0.47.description: ShowIKRSS uses RSS to display Imagekind Galleries. Insert "[rsspics:IMGSIZE,SASID,TRKCODE,URL]" into a post or page. Replace "IMGSIZE" with the size image you want to show... 100, 150, 200, 350, 450, or 650. Replace "SASID" with your ShareASale ID number. Replace "TRKCODE" with a Tracking code. Replace "URL" with the URL of the RSS feed starting with "http://".
